price: (35) And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ وَزِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wajaʿalnā maʿahu akhāhu hārūna wazīran
